products.title: Studded Quilted Leather Jacket
products.description: Quilted lambskin leather with metal studs, fill and satin lining. Full zip closure with double welt hand pockets at lower front and interior chest pockets. Elasticized leather cuffs and hem. Inset leather logo appliqué with metal studs and embroidery at chest and back.

products.title: Supreme®/Griffin Anorak
products.description: All cotton twill with two-layer blade cut construction. Half zip closure with welt pouch pocket at lower front and velcro flap pocket at chest. Interior elastic shockcord at fixed hood and hem with velcro tab adjusters at cuffs. Side zip opening. Woven logo patch at pocket flap and printed logo at back hem. Made exclusively for Supreme.

products.title: Gonz GORE-TEX Shell Jacket
products.description: Waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX poly shell with taped seams. Full zip closure with zip pockets at front and sleeve. Interior elastic shockcord at fixed hood and hem with velcro tab adjusters at cuffs. Embroidered logos at hood, hem and sleeve. Welded and bonded graphic appliqué with printed logo at back. Original artwork by Mark Gonzales.

products.title: 2-Tone Paneled Denim Jacket
products.description: All cotton 13 oz. denim with contrast panels and button front closure. Welt hand pockets at lower front with patch pockets at chest. Tab adjusters at cuffs and back hem with leather logo patch. Embroidered logo on left pocket.

products.title: Jacquard Panel Track Jacket
products.description: Water resistant Supplex® nylon taslan with mesh and taffeta lining. Full zip closure with on seam hand pockets and interior chest pocket. Elastic cuffs and hem. Jacquard logo panels with embroidered logo on chest.

products.title: Heavenly Silk Polo
products.description: Silk polo with printed graphic. Two-button placket and knit rib collar.

products.title: Lurex S/S Shirt
products.description: Poly lurex with snap front closure and patch pockets at chest. Embroidered logo at left pocket.

products.title: Supreme®/TOYO Steel T-320 Toolbox
products.description: Seamless steel tool box with debossed logo at top. Rounded top handle and cylinder lock. 13.1" x 5.4" x 3.8". Made in Japan exclusively for Supreme.

products.title: Supreme®/Nebo Slim 1200 Pocket Light
products.description: Rechargeable, IPX7 waterproof 1,200 lumen pocket light with five light modes up to 12,000 lumens. Power Bank charges USB-powered devices. Magnetic pocket clip and magnetic base. 4.45” x 1.69” x 0.87”. Made exclusively for Supreme.

products.title: Tenugui Towel (Set of 2)

products.title: Supreme®/Hanes® Crew Socks (4 Pack)
products.description: Cotton blend Hanes® cushion comfort crew sock with jacquard logo at top.

products.title: Backpack
products.description: Water resistant Cordura® recycled nylon with embossed logo lining. Main zip compartment with single layer laptop sleeve. Front zip compartment with interior velcro mesh pocket. Additional front zip pockets and elastic mesh side pockets. Padded mesh back panel and adjustable shoulder straps with buckle closure. Woven logo webbing at straps and front with webbing handle. Woven logo label at lower front. 22L.

products.title: Large Haul Tote
products.description: Water resistant Cordura® recycled nylon with embossed logo lining. Open top main compartment with buckle closure. Additional pouch pocket at front. Adjustable shoulder strap and woven logo webbing handles at top and sides. Compression straps at sides. Woven logo label at front. 15" x 25" x 16". 80L.

products.title: Duffle Bag
products.description: Water resistant Cordura® recycled nylon with embossed logo lining. Main zip compartment with interior zip pocket. Zip cargo pockets at front and zip stash pocket at back. Adjustable shoulder strap. Woven logo webbing with webbing handles at top. Woven logo label at front. 39L.

products.title: Shoulder Bag
products.description: Water resistant Cordura® recycled nylon with embossed logo lining. Main zip compartment with interior velcro mesh pocket. Additional front zip pocket with interior hanging key clip. Adjustable woven logo webbing shoulder strap. Woven logo webbing at front zip pocket. 2.5L

products.title: Small Waist Bag
products.description: Water resistant Cordura® recycled nylon with embossed logo lining. Main zip compartment with interior velcro mesh pocket. Adjustable woven logo webbing waist strap with buckle closure. Woven logo label at front zip pocket. 1L.

products.title: Organizer Pouch Set
products.description: Set of three water resistant Cordura® recycled nylon organizer pouches. Small 3.9" x 7.9". Medium 8.3" x 9.8". Large 11" x 12.6".

products.title: Supreme®/Nike® Air Force 1 Low
products.description: Full-grain leather upper with perforated leather toe panel and DURAPLUSH lining. Co-branded footbed, lace lock and tongue label. Embroidered logos at eyestay and heel with debossed printed logo at side. Set of printed logo laces included. Made exclusively for Supreme.

products.title: Supreme®/Independent® Truck
products.description: Classic Independent® truck with custom Supreme art. Each size sold separately as a pair of two trucks. Made exclusively for Supreme.

products.title: Supreme®/Spitfire® Shop Wheels (Set of 4)
products.description: Classic Spitfire® wheels with custom Supreme art. Each size sold separately as a set of four wheels. 52mm & 54mm wheels are classic 99D hard urethane. Made exclusively for Supreme.

products.title: Box Logo T-Shirt Skateboard
products.description: Supreme skate deck with natural veneer and black top ply. Printed graphic on bottom with printed World Famous and box logo on top. Painted by Robby Rose.

products.description: Supreme skate deck with natural veneer and black top ply. Printed graphic on bottom with printed World Famous and box logo on top.
